sql.name: hbeoms.netqualitylink
sql.item: select distinct(t.c1),t.c700000001,t.c700000003 as 工单编号, t.c700000006 as 建单时间,t.c700000004 as 建单人, t.c700000011 as 主题,t.c700000015 as 紧急程度, t.c700000014 as 所属专业,t.c700000010 as 工单状态 from {900} t,(select * from {700} union all select * from {800}) log,{100} u,{200} g,{600} gu where log.c700020407=t.c1 and log.c700020408=t.c700000001 and log.c700020401=(select max(log.c700020401) from (select * from {700} union all select * from {800}) log where log.c700020402='完成' and log.c700020408=t.c700000001 and log.c700020407=t.c1) and log.c700020404=u.c630000001 and gu.c620000027=g.c1 and gu.c620000028=u.c1 --and g.c630000018='综合室' --and t.c802030511='质检不通过' {2} {3} {5}
